Title: Requires wireless telephone service providers disable stolen cellphones
Summary: Enacts Detective Brian Simonsen's law; requires police officers report stolen cellphones to wireless telephone service providers who must then disable such stolen cellphones.
LawCode: Add ยง845-e, Exec L; add ยง399-eee, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the general business law, in relation to requiring wireless telephone service providers disable stolen cellphones
